package.name: SakuraLuv Zeppelin/Xeon theme
package.shortDescription: A theme for Xeon and Zeppelin based off of the :SakuraLuv: emote found on Discord servers.

descriptionlist.description: A theme for Xeon and Zeppelin based off of the :SakuraLuv: emote found on Discord servers. See screenshots for how it will look like. Tested on iPad Pro 11" and iPhone X on iOS 14.3RC1.
All content is property of their respective owners.

screenshot.description: Theme applied on iPad Pro 11". Shown in Twitter app.
